message.content: The paper does not mention any specific arXiv CS sub-category, so we cannot determine the exact category it belongs to. However, based on the content of the paper, the following five arXiv CS sub-categories are likely: cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.DB (Databases), and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper discusses a question answering system that uses an ontology-based approach, which involves natural language processing, knowledge representation, and reasoning. These topics are relevant to the aforementioned sub-categories, particularly cs.CL, cs.AI, and cs.IR. Additionally, the paper mentions experiments on an organizational ontology, which suggests a connection to cs.DB and cs.LG.
